entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, who is sneaking around at night.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who gives the password to the Fat Lady and waits outside for Harry.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts, who showed Harry the dragons on a previous night.

entities.name: fat lady
entities.description: A portrait that guards the entrance to Gryffindor common room.

entities.name: boris the bewildered
entities.description: A statue in the corridors of Hogwarts.

entities.name: egg
entities.description: A heavy object that Harry is carrying under his cloak.

entities.name: map
entities.description: A map that Harry is holding in front of his nose to navigate the corridors.

entities.name: cloak
entities.description: An object that Harry wears to conceal himself.

entities.name: dragon
entities.description: A creature that Hagrid showed Harry on a previous night.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are together as they sneak around at night.
Harry interacts with the Fat Lady by giving her the password.
